title: Fifth Most-Popular Unapologetic Episode of 2021
itunes:title: Fifth Most-Popular Unapologetic Episode of 2021
description: Thanks for checking out this episode of the Unapologetic show where we defend truth without comprise. We are counting down the top 5 episodes of the last year. Just a reminder, we are a listener and viewer-supported ministry. There are three ways you can support this show. One is to join our financial support team at oneminuteapologist.com and click donate. The second is to purchase some OMA merch that can be found below any of our videos on YouTube. The third is like this video, subscribe to our channel and share this with your social media network. Let's look at the fifth most-watched episode this year. Take the OMA Mental Health Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/mhcc Take the OMA Apologetics Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/acc https://www.patreon.com/oneminuteapologist
